product_name: SunCloud Star Polarized Sunglasses - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's SunCloud Star polarized sunglasses reduce glare and block 100% of harmful UV rays to keep your eyes protected whether you're just hanging out or kicking it up a notch. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and a third the weight; they're also acid- and heat-resistant. Grilamid(R) lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility at any temperature, and they are extremely impact resistant. Hydrophilic Megol(TM) nose pads and temple tips become tackier when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather. SunCloud Star polarized sunglasses have a small fit. Closeout.
short_description: The women's SunCloud Star polarized sunglasses reduce glare and block 100% of harmful UV rays to keep your eyes protected whether you're just hanging out or kicking it up a notch.
